An alternative to CreatureAsset that does not use inheritance. Supply a template and any needed prefab code.

public sealed class SealedCreatureAsset : CreatureAsset

Constructors

SealedCreatureAsset(PrefabInfo, CreatureTemplate, Func<GameObject, CreatureComponents, IEnumerator>, Action<GameObject>)

Creates a basic Creature Asset that does not use inheritance. Supply a template and any needed prefab code. Call the Register method to add the creature to the game.

public SealedCreatureAsset(PrefabInfo prefabInfo, CreatureTemplate template, Func<GameObject, CreatureComponents, IEnumerator> modifyPrefab = null, Action<GameObject> applyMaterials = null)

Parameters

prefabInfo PrefabInfo

The unique PrefabInfo of this creature instance.

template CreatureTemplate

The template that contains all of the creature's data.

modifyPrefab Func<GameObject, CreatureComponents, IEnumerator>

An optional call that allows for modification of the prefab after creation.

applyMaterials Action<GameObject>

An optional call that, if overriden, no longer applies the MarmosetUBER shader automatically and allows for full control of the materials. Called AFTER modifyPrefab!

Properties

OnApplyMaterials

An optional call that, if overriden, no longer applies the MarmosetUBER shader automatically and allows for full control of the materials. Called AFTER OnModifyPrefab!

public Action<GameObject> OnApplyMaterials { get; set; }

Action<GameObject>

An optional call that allows for modification of the prefab after creation.
